author: Kuro
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `Osu` cog! CLICK THE CIRCLES, TO THE BEAT!
How to set osu! API key:
1. Go to https://osu.ppy.sh/p/api and login.
2.Set App Name as your bot's name & App URL as https://osu.ppy.sh/api/v1/ or whatsoever.
3.Copy the API Key and set it with `[p]osukey <API_Key>`.
description: Displays detailed user information about osu! users in an embed.
